descriptions.X1PAREDU: X1 Parents'/guardians' highest level of education
descriptions.X2PAREDU: X2 Parents'/guardians' highest level of education
descriptions.X1MTHINT: X1 Scale of student's interest in fall 2009 math course
descriptions.X2MTHINT_R: X2 Scale of student's interest in fall 2009 math course (REVISED)
descriptions.X1SCIINT: X1 Scale of student's interest in fall 2009 science course
descriptions.X2SCIINT: X2 Scale of student's interest in fall 2009 science course
descriptions.X4X2SES: X4 Revised X2 Socio-economic status composite
descriptions.X3TGPAHIMTH: X3 GPA - highest level mathematics course taken
descriptions.X3TGPAHISCI: X3 GPA - highest level science course taken
descriptions.A1MSMENTOR: A1 A25D Pairs students with mentors in math or science
descriptions.A1MSSPEAKER: A1 A25E Brings in guest speakers to talk about math or science
descriptions.A1MSFLDTRIP: A1 A25F Takes students on math- or science-relevant field trips
descriptions.A1MSPRGMS: A1 A25G Tells students about math/science contests/websites/blogs/other programs
descriptions.S1GOODGRADES: S1 E01E Getting good grades is important to 9th grader
descriptions.S1HRMHOMEWK: S1 E15A Hours spent on math homework/studying on typical schoolday
descriptions.S1HRSHOMEWK: S1 E15B Hours spent on science homework/studying on typical schoolday
descriptions.S1HROTHHOMWK: S1 E15C Hours spent on other homework/studying on typical schoolday
descriptions.S1HRACTIVITY: S1 E15D Hours spent on extracurricular activities on typical schoolday
descriptions.S1HRTV: S1 E15H Hours spent watching television or movies on typical schoolday
descriptions.S1HRVIDEO: S1 E15I Hours spent playing video games on typical schoolday
descriptions.S1HRONLINE: S1 E15J Hours spent chatting or surfing online on typical schoolday
descriptions.S2LATESCH: S2 A17A Times late for school in last 6 months of school
descriptions.S2ABSENT: S2 A17B Times absent from school in last 6 months of school
descriptions.S2WOHWDN: S2 A17C Times in class without homework in last 6 months of school
descriptions.S2WOPAPER: S2 A17D Times in class without notetaking supplies in last 6 months of school
descriptions.S2WOBOOKS: S2 A17E Times in class without books/reading material in last 6 months of school
descriptions.S2SKIPCLASS: S2 A17F Times cut or skipped classes in last 6 months of school
descriptions.S2INSCHSUSP: S2 A17G Times put on in-school suspension in last 6 months of school

questions.X2PAREDU:
1 = "Less than high school"
2 = "High school diploma or GED or alterntive HS credential"
3 = "Certificate/diploma from school providing occupational training"
4 = "Associate's degree"
5 = "Bachelor's degree"
6 = "Master's degree"
7 = "Ph.D/M.D/Law/other high lvl prof degree"
-8 = "Unit non-response"
